column1: We hereby guarantee that the above product comply in all respect to the Indian food laws i.e. Prevention of Food Adulteration Act (1954) and Fruit Products Order (1955) and all acts, amending or supplementing the same

This certificate shall also constitute a Continuing Guarantee of the matters started above.

column1: The undersigned guarantees that the product supplied to < CLIENT NAME > < CLIENT ADDRESS > and delivered in one Or more deliveries, is made from 100% sound, mature & wholesome fruit is authentic & is free from any dyestuff and preservatives & is not modified and/or adulterated and/or misbranded and/or enriched in anyway by addition of natural or artificial substances and/or sugars and/or stabilizing agents(Like E.C. Emulsifiers, jellying agents etc), within the meaning of the European Food legislation with special reference to the E.C Flavouring directive and/or E.C. Directive for food additives.

The product is manufactured under highly qualified & sanitary conditions corresponding to International Good Manufacturing Standards and is in conformity with the specifications. As agreed in purchase order, and is suitable for it's intended application in Fruit juice and/or Fruit Nectars in the meaning of E.C. Fruit Juice directive.
The undersigned guarantees that these products do not contain any additives or components of which the use is prohibited or restricted by European Food Laws.
The producer and/or seller warrants that the product also fully corresponds to the AIJN Code of Practice for the Arsenic and Heavy Metals.

,"""Loading Supervision Report""","Loading Supervision Report","exotic_fruits","Yes","Server",0,"

{{ _(""LOADING/STUFFING SUPERVISION REPORT"") }}
1. Each drum is sealed with tamper evident proof seal with EF logo.
2. One sample bag with 2 blank labels is stuffed in the container & kept on first row from door.
3. Pine wood pallets used are heat treated as ISPM #15.
4. Four drums on each pallets are tied with PP strap at the top & bottom.
5. Client approved printed label with one year expiry date pasted on the drum.
6. Production dates & Best before dates are as mentioned on labels. Shelf life will remain more than
50% at the time of receiving to the client.
7. Kept 8 Nos of bags 0f 500 gms dry air dessicant in each container.
